name: Curse in Bloom
description:
The story begins...

To save her beloved knight from a curse, Lady Lavinia confronts a monster - but is she willing to betray her own heart?

This is a short, linear visual novel made for the 2022 Spooktober Visual Novel Jam. I plan on adding choices to it later.

Click the arrow below to read the content warning.

CONTENT WARNING This game features potentially sensitive content, such as
  • Implied sword battle violence
  • Several visual depictions of blood
  • Death
  • Suffocation
  • Implied stalking
  • Emotional abuse (misleading)
  • Lung disease
  • Abandonment
    • Player discretion is advised.
Features:
  • ~10 min playtime
  • graphic novel style
  • animated comic panels
  • heartbreak

Credits:

This game was solo-developed by Ebbasuke.

The game uses a speech bubble system by RenpyRemix. I would also like to thank Raseruuuuu for helping out with it and being an inspiration 🧡
